turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, what can i do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you help me with placing an order at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. Which starbucks do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order from the Starbucks on Old York Road in Jenkintown, Pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I have a venti?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want the drink iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds good and what kind of milk did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like 2%.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. The order is for 1 venti iced caramel macchiato with 2% milk from the starbucks on old york road in jenkintown.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that all correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is the total. Did you want me to place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted the order. It'll be ready for pick up in 15 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it. Thank you so much for your help today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, enjoy your iced beverage.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, I will.
